name: Twitter - Fix for night mode
description: This theme fixes the current night mode, and removes the ugly borders from all the elements, and replaces some of them with a solid background.
additional_info:
Change log:

v1.1.0 - Lots of fixes
- Lots of white borders removed outside of the main page

v1.0.0 - First release
- White borders removed
- Semi-transparent background for mentioned tweets and embedded content
